name: Verify Visual Rendering
description: Validates that game visuals render correctly without graphical artifacts.
testObjective: Ensure visual rendering is consistent and free from persistent graphical bugs.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Launch the game and observe the initial scene
steps.expected: Scene renders clearly without visual artifacts
No persistent visual artifacts, floating pixels, or rendering bugs are observed

steps.action: Walk through different areas of the ship
steps.expected: All areas render correctly without graphical glitches

steps.action: Check for any persistent pixel squares or visual artifacts following the player
steps.expected: No pixel squares or artifacts should follow the player's movement

steps.action: Interact with various objects and observe rendering
steps.expected: Objects remain visually stable during and after interaction

postconditions: Game renders consistently across all areas
